# kCFStringEncodingInvalidId

**Global Variable**

Used as a function result to identify an encoding that is not supported or recognized by CFString.

## Declaration

```swift
var kCFStringEncodingInvalidId: UInt32 { get }
```
title: kCFStringEncodingInvalidId
